name: Grey Area (nternamehere)
description:
Luma and Noc have fallen in love and want to create a world where they can be together. In order to do that, they must sew the seams of their respective worlds into one. Separate from one another to solve the puzzles, then platform your way to the final portal to victory - together!

In order to solve the puzzles, you will have to temporarily split Luma and Noc to their respective worlds, the Dark World and the Light World. In each, you will find objects that must be placed or moved accordingly for them to appear in the Overworld. Once you’ve solidified your way to the white and black portal, you’ve successfully beaten the level.

W / 🠑  - Jump (hold to charge)

Tip: Holding the jump button while approaching a spring will make you launch higher than ever before

A / 🠐 - Left

D / 🠒 - Right

S / 🠓 - Split

Tip: Return to the place you split at with both Luma and Noc to rejoin.

Space - Push

Uploaded for the GMTK GameJam 2021!

Art and Music done by null and void.
